title: Game 6 Klay is Coming…
description:
Jalen & Jacoby are counting down to Game 6 of the NBA Finals. Coming off his worst game of the series, going 0 for 9 from three point range, Jalen explains why the Celtics had better just accept that he’s going to bounce back in a big way. AND – Find out why Game 6 Klay WILL be in the building, not the Klay Thompson we all saw in the first few games of the series. PLUS – Fake Klay lost out on 10 thousand dollars’ worth of season tickets and received an indefinite ban from the Chase Center for sneaking in to participate in the Warriors shoot around the other day. He says it was worth it – the guys will tell you if that was a BOSS move or a SOFT move. ALSO – Boban absolutely dominated a group of little kids at summer camp…and the guys are here for every second of it!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
